name: Generate Fliki videos from new Wordpress articles
description:
This template helps you automate the process of turning new Wordpress blog posts into videos using Fliki. It monitors a specified Wordpress site posts, detects when a new post is published, and extracts the latest article URL. Once the latest post is identified, it sends the URL to Fliki, where a new video is automatically created using the article content.

This workflow is ideal for content creators, marketers, or publishers who want to quickly repurpose written blog content into video format for platforms like YouTube, Instagram, or LinkedIn - saving time and maintaining consistent publishing across formats.
